About the Company: JMT Auto Ltd. manufactures automotive components parts. The Company manufactures around 1200 automobile components ranging from engine components, gears, shafts, pins, bushes, idler bearings, carrier housing, gear rings, axles, synchro cones, carriers, gear box assemblies, seal wear rings, oil pump cover ,drums sleeves, carrier assemblies, pipe assemblies, flywheel assemblies, sear wear ring, cone And cup(heat treatment),bushes, oil pump gear, seat valve, lever rocker assembly, steering spindle, assemblies, engine gears, spindles, drums for light, medium & heavy commercial vehicles, tractors and diesel engines.
